CustomField.formula: IF( (!ISBLANK( Honeywell_Internal_Hold_Start_time__c ) && !ISBLANK( Honeywell_Internal_Hold_End_time__c )) , (( Honeywell_Internal_Hold_End_time__c - Honeywell_Internal_Hold_Start_time__c ) * 24+ IF( ISBLANK(Past_Honeywell_Internal_in_Hours__c),0,Past_Honeywell_Internal_in_Hours__c )) , IF( (!ISBLANK( Honeywell_Internal_Hold_Start_time__c ) && ISBLANK( Honeywell_Internal_Hold_End_time__c )), (( now() - Honeywell_Internal_Hold_Start_time__c ) * 24+ IF( ISBLANK(Past_Honeywell_Internal_in_Hours__c),0,Past_Honeywell_Internal_in_Hours__c )),0))
CustomField.label: Waiting for Honeywell Internal in Hours
